name: Jessica Garson
body:
### About 
Jessica is active in the DC tech scene serving organizer of the The Tech Lady Hackathon and Hack&&Tell DC. She is strong advocate for tech inclusion. 

She currently the Manager of Data Science at Burson-Marsteller. At Burson-Marsteller she uses python to build a set of analytics tools. Before joining Burson-Marsteller, Jessica worked at the National Education Association, ISSI Data, Salsa Labs and numerous Democratic campaigns.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
